text_block_list.text:
On the day of Biwa Hayahide's race,<n>I take Narita Brian to
the Hanshin<n>Racecourse to see her sister's debut.

text_block_list.name: Narita Brian
text_block_list.text: You'd better have been telling the<n>truth this morning.

text_block_list.name: Narita Brian
text_block_list.text:
Don't play dumb. I won't let you<n>back out of your promise
after coming<n>this far.

text_block_list.name: Narita Brian
text_block_list.text:
Tch... You just don't quit! Why in the<n>world would I go with
you?
choice_data_list: I really think you need to see this!
I really think you need to see this!

text_block_list.name: Narita Brian
text_block_list.text:
Fine, but you'll promise to never<n>come sniffing around me
again. Wait,<n>that's not enough—turn in your<n>trainer's
badge too!

text_block_list.name: Narita Brian
text_block_list.text: ...Hmm.
Well, she's here, so it worked at<n>least. All that's left is...

text_block_list.name: Caster
text_block_list.text:
It's time for the Junior Make Debut!<n>Who will shine as our
victor today?

text_block_list.name: Narita Brian
text_block_list.text: She's next.

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text: (Are you watching, Brian?)

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text:
(You've always loved running more<n>than anyone. It's only
natural for you<n>to crave a worthy opponent.)

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text:
(But you're simply too talented, so<n>your hopes were
always dashed...<n>That's why you're so quick to give<n>up
on others.)

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text:
(But you must learn, Brian, that a<n>worthy opponent can
come from<n>anywhere—even from the depths of<n>failure!)

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text: Haaaaah!

text_block_list.name: Caster
text_block_list.text:
Biwa Hayahide's in the lead! She's<n>way ahead of the
pack! She's two,<n>no, three lengths—wait, this is turning<n>into
a landslide victory!

text_block_list.name: Narita Brian
text_block_list.text:
What is this? Since when could she<n>run like that? It's as if
she's on the<n>hunt and all she can see is the finish<n>line...

text_block_list.name: Narita Brian
text_block_list.text: Tch!

text_block_list.name: Narita Brian
text_block_list.text:
Sis! Why have you been hiding that<n>amazing skill all this
time?! Why<n>haven't you ever asked me to race<n>you?!

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text: I see you made it, Brian... And you<n>too.

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text: Let's go over to the stands, shall<n>we?

text_block_list.name: Narita Brian
text_block_list.text: Huh? I'm trying to talk to you here—
Wooooo!

text_block_list.name: Narita Brian
text_block_list.text:
Huh?! What's with that cheering?<n>It's even louder than
when you<n>raced...

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text:
It's loud indeed. However good a<n>race I ran, it was merely a
debut. It<n>pales in comparison to the main<n>event.

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text:
Do not underestimate others, Brian.<n>There are racers here
far greater than<n>me.

text_block_list.name: Caster
text_block_list.text:
It's finally time for the main race of<n>the day! Among all
these amazing<n>athletes, who will break ahead and<n>achieve
glory?

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text: Who do you think will win this race?

text_block_list.name: Narita Brian
text_block_list.text: To be honest, I don't care. All I want<n>is to race you—

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text: I think it will be her.

text_block_list.name: Senior Umamusume
text_block_list.text: Hraaaaagh!

text_block_list.name: Narita Brian
text_block_list.text: Wait, that voice...

text_block_list.name: Senior Umamusume
text_block_list.text:
That was no win! I should never...<n>have gone up against a
beast like that!

text_block_list.name: Narita Brian
text_block_list.text:
You're kidding me. She was nothing<n>like this when I raced
her. She didn't<n>even have the drive to win!

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text:
She told me something... "I don't care<n>how far ahead Brian
is—I'll defeat<n>her." She even started training from<n>scratch
to face you again one day.

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text: But she said she's going to win this<n>race first.

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text:
This is the Twinkle Series, Brian.<n>Everyone here struggles
until the very<n>end to achieve a spot at the top.

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text:
This world is where you belong. But<n>you've yet to take your
first step into<n>it.

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text:
When you do, I'll be there waiting—at<n>the pinnacle of racing,
the G1 level.

I swallow and make an audible gulp,<n>but the sound is
completely drowned<n>out...
Wooooo!

The applause at the Twinkle Series<n>grows even louder, with
an energy<n>great enough to capture Narita<n>Brian's
attention.
choice_data_list: Do you want to race here?
Do you want to race here?

text_block_list.name: Narita Brian
text_block_list.text: Damn right, I do! Tch!

text_block_list.name: Narita Brian
text_block_list.text:
I'm changing the terms of your<n>promise. You can keep
being a trainer,<n>but on one condition...

text_block_list.name: Narita Brian
text_block_list.text: Be my trainer... And get me to theTwinkle Series!
A few days later...

text_block_list.name: Hishi Amazon
text_block_list.text: Brian... What race are you goin' for<n>next?

text_block_list.name: Narita Brian
text_block_list.text: Sigh... Why? It's got nothing todo with you.

text_block_list.name: Hishi Amazon
text_block_list.text: Yeah, it does, you jerk. I'm gonna putmyself through special training justfor that day. And I'm gonna crush you.

text_block_list.name: Hishi Amazon
text_block_list.text:
You know what one-on-one means?<n>We race until one of us
drops. And I<n>ain't on the ground yet, so don't you<n>dare
back out now.

text_block_list.name: Narita Brian
choice_data_list:
Something tells me she's going to get a lot
better.

Something tells me she's going to get a lot
better.

text_block_list.name: Narita Brian
text_block_list.text:
Haha! I get it now—I really was<n>underestimating people. So
this is<n>what Tracen is all about.

text_block_list.name: Narita Brian
text_block_list.text:
It'll do. I'll stay so I can shred every<n>last one of them. Let's
get to it,<n>Trainer!
